item.title: Instrument Framework v1.12.3.2
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.12.3.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2022 18:47:10 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.12.3]
- Issue #80: Fix issue with read/write message states not propagating connection info
- Update State History to include longer and controllable history
- minor subsystem UI updates

[1.12.2]
- Issue #78: Change magnet set point tolerance to 0.01 T
- Issue #79: Change temperature set point tolerance to 0.01 K and add control for comparison mode (in range, less than, greater than)

[1.12.1]
- Issue #77: fix issue preventing communication across the network

[1.12.0]
This release has major changes in the way configuration is handled. You should make the following changes to your code:
- "Read Configuration File" and "Write Configuration File" should be configured to <i>call parent method</i>
- "Get SMO PGSQL Log Paths" will need two front panel controls to match the parent method
- Instrument.Template.lvclass:Instrument.Template.AppLauncher has improvements to allow the user easier access to configuration
- Front panel controls
- examine configuration.ini state (and macro)
- refinements to SMO start and stop macros
- Data: Wait state
- If you use Configuration.lvclass directly (likely in UI process), should can use "Write Section" to control the ini header
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.8.2
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.8.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2022 12:40:18 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: - Update to Instrument Framework v1.12.3
- Give simulation mode its own port number
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.3.9
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.3.9
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 30 Aug 2022 14:42:04 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: - Issue #63: Implement arbitrary sweep table support.
- Rudimentary tables can be created inside the UI (e.g., [0,1,2,0])
- More complicated arbitrary waveforms can be loaded via the API "setSweepTable" method
- Issue #64: implement output sampling rate to avoid memory overflow errors during sweep mode
- Issue #65: better support for USB-4431 Devices
- Fix issues with measuring offset; updated notch filter
- Updated waveguide model (AI1 gain)
- Miscellaneous bugfixes and UI improvements

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013 (32 bit / x86)](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: XY Utilities v1.5.2.2
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.5.2.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2022 15:26:52 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square, Log
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: New Methods
- 2D to YX.vi

Bug Fixes
- Subset would not be inclusive of the final point
- Subset slider method would not correctly caclulate the range
- Interpolate would not interpolate the final point correctly if X_max == X_high
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
